comments.en:
The Samsung CLP-620 is a networked color laser printer with a 2010 street price of $199 USD. This printer is supported by the foo2qpdl open software printer driver.

Consumables: Separate toner cartridges black (4000 prints, ~$80), yellow/magenta/cyan (4000 prints, ~$110 each), transfer belt (35000 prints, ~$47)
